verses.text: Ha Jehová, Dios Axonhejochi, a ix loloni. Ix yavtej heb' kajan t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, b'aj sjawi k'u masanto b'aj tz'em k'u.
Ha t'a tzalan Sion, aton chonhab' te wach' yilji, ata' sch'ox sakil k'inal Dios.
Tik sja ko Diosal, palta manh ichnhejoctalaj ol jawok. Ha t'a spatic yichanh ay jun k'ak' to satumeli yet' jun chacxuxum ik'.
Ato t'a chaanh tz'avtaj heb' aj satcha’anh yet' heb' kajan t'a sat lum lum tik yuj Dios, yic wach' syil heb' sch'olb'itaj schonhab'.
Syal Dios icha tik: Molb'ejec he b'a ex wicxo, a ex eyak'nac jun silab' t'ayin, ayic eyak'annac he trato wed'oc, xchi.
Ha satcha’anh sch'oxani to ha Dios Juez ton t'a stojolal.
Syalanpax Dios icha tik: Ex in chonhab' Israel, ab'ecnab'i, jichan ol wutej walanoch he paltail t'a he sat. Ha in Dios in, he Diosal in.
Maj ex in tumejlaj yuj eyofrenda tzeyak'taxon t'ayin yet' nok' nok' tze nhus silab'il t'ayin t'a waltar.
Max in k'anlaj nok' kelemtac wakax molb'il eyuuj. Malaj nok' mam chiwa t'a yol he macte' tzin k'an t'ayex.
Vicnhej masanil nok' kaltacte'al nok', wik pax nok' molb'etzal nok' ay t'a jolomtac witz.
Vic masanil nok' much ay t'a kaltac te' yet' masanil tas tzek' t'a kal wayumtac.
Q'uinaloc ay in wejel, manh ol wal-laj t'ayex, yujto wik jun yol yib'anhk’inal tik yet' masanil tas ay t'ay.
¿Tocwal a sb'ak'chil nok' wakax tzin chi'a? ¿Tocwal a pax schiq'uil nok' mam chiwa swuk'ej?
Ha silab' tzin nib'ej, to tzeyak' yuj diosal t'ayin, tzeyak'elk'och tas tzeyaltej t'ayin, a in ton ek' in to t'a yib'anh smasanil.
Ayic ay eyaelal, avtejinec, ol ex in colo', a exxo ol in eyik'chaanh, xchi Dios.
Axo t'a heb' chuk sb'eyb'al, syal Dios icha tik: ¿Toc ay eyalan eyic eyalanel in k'ayb'ub'al, ma eyalanel yab'ixal in trato?
Ina to max yal-laj he k'ool tzex in cacha', malaj yelk'och in lolonel t'ayex.
Ayic sja winh elk'umtaxoni, tzex k'e urnaj he b'at yet' winh. Te wach' eyak'anpax yet' heb' sk'ulan ajmulal.
Palta a tas tze k'ulej, to tze nak'e lolonel, max ex och waan eyesani.
Ha t'a heb' eyuk'tac junnhej he nun yet'oc, tzeyal chukal lolonel t'a spatic heb'.
Ayic ix he k'ulan juntzanh chukal tik, malaj tas swala'. Yuj chi' tze na' to lajan in eyed'oc, palta ol waloch he mul chi' t'a he sat, ol wil-lajoch in sat eyed'oc.
Ha ex tzin b'at satk'olal eyuuj tik, wach'okab' tz'aj snachajel jun tik eyuuj, haxo talaj tz'aji, ol ex in jatchitejb'ati, manhxalaj mach ol ex colan t'ayin.
Ha mach tz'ak'an yuj diosal t'ayin, ay welk'och t'a yol sat. Ha mach tzin k'anab'ajani, ol in colcaneli, xchi Dios.
